class Solution {

        // åªæœ‰ 0 æ»¡è¶³è¿™ä¸€å±æ€§

        // å½“æ•°å­—é•¿åº¦ä¸ºå¥‡æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ revertedNumber/10 å»é™¤å¤„äºä¸­ä½çš„æ•°å­—ã€‚

class Clerk { // å”®è´§å‘˜
     private int product = 0;

     public synchronized void addProduct() { if (product >= 20) {
         try {
             wait();
          } catch (InterruptedException e) {
             e.printStackTrace();
          }
         } else {
            product++;
         System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…ç”Ÿäº§äº† ç¬¬" + product + "ä¸ªäº§å“");
         notifyAll();
        }
       }

  public synchronized void getProduct() {
      if (this.product <= 0) {
         try {
           wait();
       } catch (InterruptedException e) { 
           e.printStackTrace();
      }
     } else {
        System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…å–èµ°äº†ç¬¬" +product + "ä¸ªäº§å“");
        product--;
        notifyAll();
     }
   }
}

class Productor implements Runnable { // ç”Ÿäº§è€…
    Clerk clerk;

  public Productor(Clerk clerk) {
     this.clerk = clerk;
}

   public void run() {
     System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…å¼€å§‹ç”Ÿäº§äº§å“");
    while (true) {
  try {
     Thread.sleep((int) Math.random() * 1000);
   } catch (InterruptedException e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
   }
     clerk.addProduct();
    }
   }
}


class Consumer implements Runnable { // æ¶ˆè´¹è€…
   Clerk clerk;
public Consumer(Clerk clerk) {

}
public void run() {
    System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…å¼€å§‹å–èµ°äº§å“");
while (true) {
    try {
      Thread.sleep((int) Math.random() * 1000);
   } catch (InterruptedException e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
   }
      clerk.getProduct();
   }
  }
}

   }
}

public int hashCode() {
      final int prime = 31;
            int result = 1;
            result = prime * result + ((accountId == null) ? 0 : accountId.hashCode());
            long temp;
            temp = Double.doubleToLongBits(balance);
            result = prime * result + (int) (temp ^ (temp >>> 32));
         return result;
     }
      public boolean equals(Object obj) {
        if (this == obj)
           return true;
        if (obj == null)
           return false;
        if (getClass() != obj.getClass())
           return false;
         Account other = (Account) obj;
        if (accountId == null) {
           if (other.accountId != null)
                return false;
             } else if (!accountId.equals(other.accountId)) 
                return false;
        if (Double.doubleToLongBits(balance) != Double.doubleToLongBits(other.balance))
         return false;
         return true;
     }
}

class WithDrawThread extends Thread {
        Account account;
        // è¦å–æ¬¾çš„é¢åº¦
        double withDraw;
        public WithDrawThread(String name, Account account, double amt) {
        super(name);
        this.account = account;
        this.withDraw = amt;
       }
     public void run() {
        synchronized (account) {
          if (account.getBalance() > withDraw) {
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + ":å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œå–ç°çš„é‡‘é¢ä¸ºï¼š " + withDraw); 
            try {
                 Thread.sleep(50);
             } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
               account.setBalance(account.getBalance() - withDraw);
            } else {
                System.out.println("å–ç°é¢åº¦è¶…è¿‡è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ï¼Œå–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥");
       }
            System.out.println("ç°åœ¨è´¦æˆ·çš„ä½™é¢ä¸ºï¼š " + account.getBalance());
      }
    }
}

       Thread t2 = new WithDrawThread("å°æ˜'s wife", account, 2800); 
       t1.start();
       t2.start();
     }
}

class Clerk { // å”®è´§å‘˜
     private int product = 0;

     public synchronized void addProduct() { if (product >= 20) {

             wait();

             e.printStackTrace();

            product++;
         System.out.println("ç”Ÿäº§è€…ç”Ÿäº§äº† ç¬¬" + product + "ä¸ªäº§å“");
         notifyAll();
        }
       }

  public synchronized void getProduct() {
      if (this.product <= 0) {
         try {
           wait();
       } catch (InterruptedException e) { 
           e.printStackTrace();
      }
     } else {
        System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…å–èµ°äº†ç¬¬" +product + "ä¸ªäº§å“");
        product--;
        notifyAll();
     }
   }
}

public int hashCode() {
      final int prime = 31;
            int result = 1;
            result = prime * result + ((accountId == null) ? 0 : accountId.hashCode());
            long temp;
            temp = Double.doubleToLongBits(balance);
            result = prime * result + (int) (temp ^ (temp >>> 32));
         return result;
     }
      public boolean equals(Object obj) {
        if (this == obj)
           return true;
        if (obj == null)
           return false;
        if (getClass() != obj.getClass())
           return false;
         Account other = (Account) obj;
        if (accountId == null) {

        if (Double.doubleToLongBits(balance) != Double.doubleToLongBits(other.balance))

class WithDrawThread extends Thread {
        Account account;

        double withDraw;
        public WithDrawThread(String name, Account account, double amt) {
        super(name);
        this.account = account;
        this.withDraw = amt;
       }
     public void run() {
        synchronized (account) {
          if (account.getBalance() > withDraw) {
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + ":å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œå–ç°çš„é‡‘é¢ä¸ºï¼š " + withDraw); 
            try {
                 Thread.sleep(50);
             } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
               account.setBalance(account.getBalance() - withDraw);
            } else {
                System.out.println("å–ç°é¢åº¦è¶…è¿‡è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ï¼Œå–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥");
       }
            System.out.println("ç°åœ¨è´¦æˆ·çš„ä½™é¢ä¸ºï¼š " + account.getBalance());
      }
    }
}

public static List duplicateList(List list) {

}

//éå†æ“ä½œçš„å‡ ç§æ–¹å¼
@Test
public void test() {
    Map hashMap = new HashMap();
    hashMap.put("AA", 123);
    hashMap.put(45, 1234);
    hashMap.put("bb", 56);
    //éå†æ‰€æœ‰çš„keyé›†ï¼škeySet()
    Set set = hashMap.keySet();
    Iterator iterator = set.iterator();
    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
        System.out.print(iterator.next() + " ");//AA bb 45
    }
    System.out.println("\n*****************************");
    //éå†æ‰€æœ‰çš„valueé›†åˆ:values()
    Collection collection = hashMap.values();
    for (Object obj : collection) {
        System.out.print(obj + " ");//123 56 1234
    }
    System.out.println("\n*****************************");
    //æ–¹å¼ä¸€ï¼šéå†æ‰€æœ‰çš„key-value:entrySet()
    Set entrySet = hashMap.entrySet();
    Iterator iterator1 = entrySet.iterator();
    while (iterator1.hasNext()) {
        Object obj = iterator1.next();
        //entrySeté›†åˆä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯entry
        Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) obj;
        System.out.print("(" + entry.getKey() + "," + entry.getValue() + ") ");
      //(AA,123) (bb,56) (45,1234)
    }
    System.out.println("\n*****************************");
    //æ–¹å¼äºŒï¼šéå†æ‰€æœ‰çš„key-value
    Set keySet = hashMap.keySet();
    Iterator iterator2 = keySet.iterator();
    while (iterator2.hasNext()) {
        Object key = iterator2.next();//key
        Object value = hashMap.get(key);//value
        System.out.print("(" + key + "," + value + ") ");//(AA,123) (bb,56) (45,1234)
    }
}

public static List duplicateList(List list) {
    HashSet set = new HashSet();
    set.addAll(list);
    return new ArrayList(set);
}

@Test
public void test() {
    Map hashMap = new HashMap();
    hashMap.put("AA", 123);

    //éå†æ‰€æœ‰çš„keyé›†ï¼škeySet()
    Set set = hashMap.keySet();

    while (iterator.hasNext()) {

    //éå†æ‰€æœ‰çš„valueé›†åˆ:values()

    Set entrySet = hashMap.entrySet();

    }
}
